meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves Mission Ridge - Apartments in San Diego, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Mission Ridge, a place where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Mission Valley apartments with a few little extras, like expansive patios and balconies, generous closet space and energy efficient windows. Simply put, our apartments in San Diego offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Mission Valley Apartments by eaves San Diego is one of the most beautiful places to live in Southern California, and you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably while staying there. At eaves Mission Ridge, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Meadowlark Drive, our Mission Valley apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 805, 163 and 8 freeways. A hotbed for tourists, you'll be near a plethora of entertainment venues and attractions such as Mission Beach, San Diego Zoo Safari Park, SeaWorld and plenty of more fantastic destinations. Take a night off from cooking and satisfy your hunger by dining at California Burritos, Sushi Diner or Home-style Hawaiian. Mission Valley Apartment Community Embrace the comfort of a convenient and quality lifestyle when you become a resident of this san Diego apartment community. Discover impressive amenities at your disposal including an outdoor swimming pool and sundeck, private garages and a barbecue and picnic area. We will sort out any problems that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the significant parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in San Diego today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: 3 beds • 2 baths • 1350 sqft • Classic Package I

Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: We’ve got a variety of finish packages for you to choose from — choose one and then dive in and make it yours.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions.

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Mission Ridge, a place where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Mission Valley apartments with a few little extras, like expansive patios and balconies, generous closet space and energy efficient windows. Simply put, our apartments in San Diego offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Mission Valley Apartments by eaves San Diego is one of the most beautiful places to live in Southern California, and you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably while staying there. At eaves Mission Ridge, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Meadowlark Drive, our Mission Valley apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 805, 163 and 8 freeways. A hotbed for tourists, you'll be near a plethora of entertainment venues and attractions such as Mission Beach, San Diego Zoo Safari Park, SeaWorld and plenty of more fantastic destinations. Take a night off from cooking and satisfy your hunger by dining at California Burritos, Sushi Diner or Home-style Hawaiian. Mission Valley Apartment Community Embrace the comfort of a convenient and quality lifestyle when you become a resident of this san Diego apartment community. Discover impressive amenities at your disposal including an outdoor swimming pool and sundeck, private garages and a barbecue and picnic area. We will sort out any problems that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the significant parts of your life.
